description: Scientists from around Europe and the US have expressed scepticism over its newly-announced vaccine.
title: Coronavirus: Russia calls international concern over vaccine 'groundless'
title_page: Coronavirus: Russia calls international concern over vaccine 'groundless' - BBC News
maintext: Acto executive director Svetlana Zavidova told the Russian MedPortal site that a decision on mass vaccination had been carried out after combined first- and second-phase tests on 76 people, and that it was impossible to confirm the efficacy of a drug on this basis.
